name: Rumble Runtz
description:
Our second release!

Rumble Runtz is a strategy puzzle game where you play with little squeaky animals and beat each other up!

Play with up to 5 different friends who all have different and unique abilities, and use your puzzle brain to get three stars on every level!

Credits:

Nikolas De la Cruz - Lead Designer and Developer @ nikolasdelacruz.com

Kseniia Potapova - Texture Artist @ https://www.artstation.com/kseniiapotapova
